Question: Deepen AI, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Deepen AI, Inc.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Sensor annotation and calibration tools for autonomous vehicles and robotics
- Enhances labeling speed and accuracy for multi-sensor data, including 2D/3D images, videos, and LiDAR
- AI-powered annotation and review tools to minimize time and effort in data labeling
- Ensures high-quality standards in data annotation for large enterprises
- Collaboration showcased with Vicomtech on a high-complexity automotive project
- Demonstrates the impact of AI in transforming the automotive industry
